means: 有分离倾向的，分离性的

sentence.Network_en: You are using logic to continue that separative structure, that is all.
sentence.Network_cn: 你一直是在用逻辑来维持那个分离的架构.

sentence.Network_en: The uniting influence was stronger than the separative.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合的影响力要强于分裂.

sentence.Network_en: By its very nature, thought is separative.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于思想本身的特性, 思想是分裂的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: separatist 分离主义者separative 分离性的separator 离析器

list.abs: 分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分局〖 suboffice;subbureau〗 分开〖 separate;divide〗 分科〖 departmentation〗.
-tion后缀 ... preparation 准备,预备 separation 分离,分开 celebration 庆祝(会),庆典.
中国特色词的译法 - Billwang 工业设计论坛 ... divorced 离异 separated 分居 number of children 子女人数.
有关环境污染的英语词汇 ... scrubbers 洗涤器 separators 分离器 smoke prevention 防烟.

means.word_mean: 1. used of an accent in Hebrew orthography; indicates that the word marked is separated to a greater or lesser degree rhythmically and grammatically from the word that follows it
2. serving to separate or divide into parts;

sentences.sentence: "the uniting influence was stronger than the separative"

means.word_mean: 3. (of a word) referring singly and without exception to the members of a group;

sentences.sentence: "whereas `each,' `every,' `either,' `neither,' and `none' are distributive or referring to a single member of a group, `which' in `which of the men' is separative"
